nodes.bodyText:
This is in an AsyncDialogFragment: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/DialogFragment#onCreateDialog(android.os.Bundle)
Doesn't seem to specify that you need to show the returned dialog, many examples don't, and show() is called during onStart
Okay - I was basing more off all the other cases showing. Seemed it should be conformant based on other usage locally to this code
